text: Futhi ningawubulali umphefumulo uMvelinqangi akwenze kwangabisemthethweniukubaubulawengaphandlekweqiniso futhi noma ngabe ubani owabulawa ngokungesibona ubulungiswa ngempela siyinikezile indlalifa yakhe igunya ngakho-ke makangayeqi imingcele mayelana nokubulala ngempela yena uyosizwa (ngumthetho)
